text: Goran Puljko (born 7 December 1977) is a Croatian rowing cox. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Croatia Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Zagreb Category:Coxswains (rowing)
title: Goran Puljko
